description: Validate Date Format Check with Valid Dates
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1001, 1, '2024-01-15', 0.10, 100.00);

description: Validate Date Format Check with Invalid Dates
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1002, 1, '9999-99-99', 0.10, 100.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error logged in #DQErrors

description: Validate Email Format with Valid Email
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2001, 'John', 'Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '555-123-4567');

description: Validate Email Format with Invalid Email - Missing @
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2002, 'Jane', 'Smith', 'janesmithexample.com', '555-123-4567');
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Email does not match valid pattern'

description: Validate Email Format with Invalid Email - Multiple @
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2003, 'Bob', 'Johnson', 'bob@@example.com', '555-123-4567');

description: Validate Phone Format with Valid US Format
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2004, 'Alice', 'Williams', 'alice@example.com', '555-123-4567');

description: Validate Phone Format with Invalid Format
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2005, 'Charlie', 'Brown', 'charlie@example.com', '12345');

description: Validate Numeric Range with Valid Price
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3001, 'Widget A', 50.00);

description: Validate Numeric Range with Negative Price
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3002, 'Widget B', -10.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Price is outside valid range'

description: Validate Numeric Range with Price Exceeding Maximum
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3003, 'Widget C', 15000.00);

description: Validate Referential Integrity - Valid Order Reference
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1003, 1, '2024-01-15', 0.10, 100.00); INSERT INTO OrderDetails (OrderDetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, UnitPrice) VALUES (4001, 1003, 1, 2, 50.00);
cleanup_sql: DELETE FROM OrderDetails WHERE OrderDetailID = 4001; DELETE FROM Orders WHERE OrderID = 1003;

description: Validate Referential Integrity - Orphaned Order Detail
setup_sql: INSERT INTO OrderDetails (OrderDetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, UnitPrice) VALUES (4002, 9999, 1, 2, 50.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'OrderDetails record references non-existent Order'

description: Validate Referential Integrity - Valid Product Reference
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3004, 'Widget D', 75.00); INSERT INTO OrderDetails (OrderDetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, UnitPrice) VALUES (4003, 1, 3004, 1, 75.00);
cleanup_sql: DELETE FROM OrderDetails WHERE OrderDetailID = 4003; DELETE FROM Products WHERE ProductID = 3004;

description: Validate Referential Integrity - Orphaned Product Reference
setup_sql: INSERT INTO OrderDetails (OrderDetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, UnitPrice) VALUES (4004, 1, 9999, 1, 75.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'OrderDetails record references non-existent Product'

description: Validate Null Values - All Required Customer Fields Present
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2006, 'David', 'Miller', 'david@example.com', '555-123-4567');

description: Validate Null Values - Missing FirstName
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2007, NULL, 'Davis', 'davis@example.com', '555-123-4567');
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Required field contains null value'

description: Validate Null Values - Missing Email
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2008, 'Emily', 'Wilson', NULL, '555-123-4567');

description: Validate Null Values - All Required Product Fields Present
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3005, 'Widget E', 125.00);

description: Validate Null Values - Missing ProductName
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3006, NULL, 150.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Required field contains null value'

description: Validate Null Values - Missing Price
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3007, 'Widget F', NULL);

description: Validate Business Rule - Valid Discount
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1004, 1, '2024-01-15', 0.25, 100.00);

description: Validate Business Rule - Excessive Discount
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1005, 1, '2024-01-15', 0.75, 100.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Discount exceeds maximum allowed (50%)'

description: Validate Business Rule - Past Order Date
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1006, 1, '2023-01-15', 0.10, 100.00);

description: Validate Business Rule - Future Order Date
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1007, 1, '2099-12-31', 0.10, 100.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Order date is in the future'

description: Validate Duplicate Detection - Unique Customer
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2009, 'Frank', 'Moore', 'frank@example.com', '555-123-4567');

description: Validate Duplicate Detection - Duplicate CustomerID
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2010, 'Grace', 'Taylor', 'grace@example.com', '555-123-4567'); INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2010, 'Grace', 'Taylor', 'grace2@example.com', '555-123-4568');
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Duplicate CustomerID found'

description: Validate Duplicate Detection - Unique Product
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3008, 'Widget G', 200.00);

description: Validate Duplicate Detection - Duplicate ProductName
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3009, 'Widget H', 250.00); INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3010, 'Widget H', 275.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Duplicate ProductName found'
cleanup_sql: DELETE FROM Products WHERE ProductID IN (3009, 3010);

description: Validate Data Consistency - Correct Order Total
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1008, 1, '2024-01-15', 0.10, 150.00); INSERT INTO OrderDetails (OrderDetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, UnitPrice) VALUES (4005, 1008, 1, 3, 50.00);
cleanup_sql: DELETE FROM OrderDetails WHERE OrderDetailID = 4005; DELETE FROM Orders WHERE OrderID = 1008;

description: Validate Data Consistency - Incorrect Order Total
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1009, 1, '2024-01-15', 0.10, 100.00); INSERT INTO OrderDetails (OrderDetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, UnitPrice) VALUES (4006, 1009, 1, 3, 50.00);
expected_output: Status: FAILED, ErrorCount: 1, Error: 'Order total does not match sum of order details'
cleanup_sql: DELETE FROM OrderDetails WHERE OrderDetailID = 4006; DELETE FROM Orders WHERE OrderID = 1009;

description: Edge Case - Empty String Email
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone) VALUES (2011, 'Henry', 'Anderson', '', '555-123-4567');

description: Edge Case - Zero Price
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Products (ProductID, ProductName, Price) VALUES (3011, 'Widget I', 0.00);

description: Edge Case - Maximum Valid Discount
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1010, 1, '2024-01-15', 0.50, 100.00);

description: Edge Case - Today's Order Date
setup_sql: INSERT INTO Orders (OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, Discount, OrderTotal) VALUES (1011, 1, GETDATE(), 0.10, 100.00);

description: Negative Test - Script Execution with No Data
setup_sql: -- No setup required
expected_output: All checks should complete with Status: PASSED or ERROR (if tables don't exist), ErrorCount: 0
